Sentence.Text: North Korea's missile launch on Tuesday was a prelude to more military operations directed at the US territory of Guam, North Korean state media said Wednesday.

Sentence.Text: Pyongyang said it fired an intermediate-range missile Hwasong-12 in Tuesday's test.

Sentence.Text: The missile's flight path took it over Japan, further fueling tensions between North Korea and the United States and its allies, Japan and South Korea.
